idea-plugin.name: Dukescript Java Regex Tester plugin
idea-plugin.description:
Visual interactive plugin using Dukescript

It has the following characteristics:
  1. Unicode categories support such as 
    \p{Letter}
    or 
    \p{InGreek}
  2. Pattern modifiers at regex such as:
    1. case insensitive matching trough prefixing with 
      (?i)
  3. hexadecimal character matching such as 
    [\x7F-\xFF]
  4. linebreaks trough 
    \n
